snippet: The United States Tennis Association accused the filmmakers of copyright infringement for using more than 20 minutes of video from the 2011 United States Open and previous ones without signing an agreement.
abstract: The United States Tennis Association accused the filmmakers of copyright infringement for using more than 20 minutes of video from the 2011 United States Open and previous ones without signing an agreement.

headline.main: U.S.T.A. Sues Filmmakers of 'Venus and Serena'
